content: Easy. Love in the Time of Cholera. I work with people to write their books, so I’m constantly reading. Fiction. Non-fiction. Books on writing craft. Books from people who want me to help them finish their books. And yes, the best book is one that makes you sad when you’re finished reading. And brings you back to read the author’s next book or whatever they recommend. Basically, I don’t think there’s much a good book can’t do.
